pinyin: Bei3 jing1 Yu3 yan2 Da4 xue2

definition: Beijing Language Institute/former name of 北京語言大學|北京语言大学[Bei3 jing1 Yu3 yan2 Da4 xue2] Beijing Language and Culture University (BLCU)
pinyin: Bei3 jing1 Yu3 yan2 Xue2 yuan4
yuan2 yu3 yan2 xue2 yi4 shi2

sentences.english: There'sno need for that kind of language in this magazine .
sentences.chinese: 这份杂志没必要出现那种语言。

sentences.english: Dr. Stevens has worked at the language institute since 1982.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂文斯从1982年起就一直在语言学院工作。

sentences.english: How could we establish multi-lingual communication models in different contexts?
sentences.chinese: 如何建立不同情境下多语言沟通模式？

sentences.english: Sing a song, Revision the target language in lesson 8 .
sentences.chinese: 目的是复习第8课的目标语言，引出新课。

sentences.english: Term and common words are in an interflow in language use.
sentences.chinese: 我们认为，它们在语言使用过程中相互渗透。

sentences.english: Paralanguage , including body language, has been extensively studied in social psychology.
sentences.chinese: 包括身体语言，已被广泛地研究社会心理学。

sentences.english: Redundancy is a linguistic phenomenon that the linguistic form is more than its linguistic content.
sentences.chinese: 羡余现象，是指语言的表达形式多于表达内容。

sentences.english: In assembly language, this is handled explicitly by the programmer.
sentences.chinese: 而在汇编语言中，却需要程序员来显式处理。

sentences.english: This experience is useful to appreciate the beauty of languages in the world.
sentences.chinese: 这是非常有用的经验体会到，在世界语言之美。

sentences.english: The sky is blue and fields are green and laughter is the language of the world.
sentences.chinese: 蓝天碧草之间笑声成了世亖界通用的语言。

sentences.english: The estimated six to seven thousand languages spoken around the globe are the repository of our collective memory and intangible heritage.
sentences.chinese: 这六七千种语言承载者我们共同的回忆和非物质遗产。

sentences.english: Ithas been translated into tens of languages, spread love to all theworld.
sentences.chinese: 被翻译成数十种语言，将爱传至世界各地。

sentences.english: But that doctor may also use value-laden language to describe the options.
sentences.chinese: 但是医生也会使用具有价值取向的语言描述这些选项。

sentences.english: A language is itself just because the way it is.
sentences.chinese: 每一种语言都是自成一体的。

sentences.english: Contrastive Rhetoric (CR) studies the differences of discourse patterns across languages and cultures.
sentences.chinese: 对比修辞研究不同语言及文化间的语篇模式差异。

sentences.english: The result is a very earthy, informal language.
sentences.chinese: 结果是一个非常朴实的，非正式的语言。

definition: the first Chinese dialect dictionary, edited by Yang Xiong 揚雄|扬雄[Yang2 Xiong2] in 1st century, containing over 9000 characters
vocabulary/list of words (e.g. for language teaching purposes)/word
variant of 詞彙|词汇[ci2 hui4]
